@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.ux.grid.RowExpander
sname
RowExpander
slabel
RowExpander
sdescriptors
xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3
sextends
xworker.html.extjs.ExtThing
smany
true
seditCols
2
sinitialization
false
smodifier
public
sdescription
<p>Plugin (ptype = 'rowexpander') that adds the ability to have a Column in a grid which enables&nbsp;a second row body which expands/contracts.&nbsp; The expand/contract behavior is configurable to react on clicking of the column, double click of the row, and/or hitting enter while a row is selected.</p>
@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.ux.grid.RowExpander/@actions
sname
actions
sdescriptors
xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3/@actions
@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.ux.grid.RowExpander/@actions/@GroovyAction
sname
toJavaScriptCode
sisSynchronized
false
sthrowException
true
suseOtherAction
false
suseOuterJava
true
souterClassName
xworker.html.extjs.Ext.ux.grid.RowExpanderCreator
smethodName
toJavaScriptCode
sdisableGlobalContext
false
sdescriptors
xworker.lang.actions.JavaAction
@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.ux.grid.RowExpander/@expandOnEnter
sname
expandOnEnter
sinputtype
truefalse
sdefault
true
sdescription
<p>&lt;tt&gt;true&lt;/tt&gt; to toggle selected row(s) between expanded/collapsed when the enter key is pressed (defaults to &lt;tt&gt;true&lt;/tt&gt;).</p>
LvalidateOnBlur
false
LallowDecimals
false
LallowNegative
false
sdescriptors

sdefault
true

false
